Options.Text: Use a frequency map counting characters in s, decrement for t, check all zero — O(n) time, O(1) space (26 letters max)
Sort both strings and compare — O(n log n) time, O(1) space
Use two hash maps for character frequencies and compare — O(n) time, O(1) space
Check every permutation of s to see if it matches t — O(n!) time, exponential and impractical
